constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 所有网格上的值都是唯一的（即每个单元格的值都不相同）

constraints.name: optimal_play
constraints.description: 玩家在每一步都采取最优策略以最大化自己的得分
constraints.formal: Marin and Gojou play optimally to maximize their points

constraints.name: turn_based
constraints.description: 游戏是回合制的，Marin先手，然后交替进行
constraints.formal: Players take turns, with Marin starting first

constraints.name: repetition_allowed
constraints.description: 允许在同一单元格上多次放置令牌，并且每次放置都会获得该单元格的分数
constraints.formal: Tokens can be placed on the same cell multiple times, and each placement scores the value of the cell
